inclusion.criterion: elective ENT surgery under general anesthesia
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: malignancy of the nose, mouth, pharynx, or larynx
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: active bleeding or waiting for ENT surgery of bleeding lesions
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate. He is a candidate for elective ENT surgery under general anesthesia.
